title: Understanding Collectivism
text: Collectivism is a cultural value that emphasizes the importance of the group over individual interests. It often involves prioritizing community goals and cooperation.

title: Characteristics of Collectivist Cultures
text: In collectivist cultures, decisions are often made for the benefit of the group. The needs of the community are prioritized over individual desires.

hintAnswer: cultures that emphasize community and cooperation. Decisions are made for the benefit of the collective. These cultures believe that it is best for society when everyone works together as a group, and the needs of the individual come secondary to the needs of the greater good.
